American Literature: The study of the literary traditions of the United States, from colonization to the present.
British & Anglophone Literature: The study of literature in English from the British Isles and the global Anglophone world.
Creative Writing: The practice, pedagogy, and craft of writing poetry, fiction, and creative non-fiction.
Media & Cinema Studies: The critical analysis of film, digital media, television, and their cultural impact.
Writing Studies & Rhetoric: The study of the theory, history, and practice of writing, persuasion, and composition.
